title: Installer error
body:
Hey. I had to wipe my hard drive to get rid of a virus. I managed to restore most of my desired programs, but I'm running into trouble with the League of Legends install wizard. I created a ticket, but my Riot guy doesn't seem to be helping all that much. Is there any advice anyone can give me? Here are the error codes:

[SEH_AV_READ_BADPTR] ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at address [0x7648a536]

Advanced Installer Enhanced UI 12.8 build 69285
*** Stack Trace (x86) ***

[0x7648a536]  GetCPInfo()
[0x7646a055]  DeleteFiber()
[0x7647922f]  GetSystemWow64DirectoryW()
[0x764ad031]  MultiByteToWideChar()
[0x71b83a04]  -----
[0x71b8a2d1]  -----
[0x71b92ea7]  IID_ITextServices()
[0x71b879b5]  -----
[0x71b9132e]  IID_IRichEditOleCallback()
[0x71b8abc3]  -----
[0x71b81f0e]  -----
[0x763dfd72]  GetWindowLongW()
[0x763dfe4a]  GetWindowLongW()
[0x763e09d3]  CallWindowProcW()
[0x763e0979]  CallWindowProcW()
[0x00035fed]  -----
[0x763dfd72]  GetWindowLongW()
[0x763dfe4a]  GetWindowLongW()
[0x763e0943]  CallMsgFilterW()
[0x763e0b36]  SendMessageW()
[0x00069e76]  -----
[0x00069df2]  -----
[0x0004c6b7]  -----
[0x0004c06f]  -----
[0x0004bb81]  -----
[0x0004a85c]  -----
[0x00049b94]  -----
[0x000499c6]  -----
[0x00050e96]  -----
[0x763d49a9]  ActivateKeyboardLayout()
[0x763d481f]  ActivateKeyboardLayout()
[0x763d4a33]  DefDlgProcW()
[0x763dfd72]  GetWindowLongW()
[0x763dfe4a]  GetWindowLongW()
[0x763d9d6a]  ReleaseDC()
[0x763d9f8d]  WCSToMBEx()
[0x77d75a7e]  KiUserCallbackDispatcher()
[0x000515dd]  -----
[0x0004a507]  -----
[0x00030000]  MODULE_BASE_ADDRESS

replies.body:
It looks like you may be using the program [**Advanced Installer**](http://www.advancedinstaller.com/) to install League. We don't support third-party installers, so I recommend you disable or get rid of Advanced Installer and try installing League using [**this installer**](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).

If you have any further issues with this, I recommend following up with the tech specialists in your open support ticket. Let me know if you have any questions.
